title: Hour 2 - Trent Dilfer, Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Trent Dilfer, Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it is obvious that the athletically and intellectually gifted people in the world just have more options. After watching the Buckeye opt-outs from the Rose Bowl and those who stepped in and shined, Colin pleads with us not to worry or grumble about what life decisions these people make. Plus, Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Also, former NFL quarterback and Super Bowl champion Trent Dilfer drops by The Herd to offer his observations from Sunday's NFL results. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
